120 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
121 // class stMAMViewObjectSample
122 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
143 template <class ObjectType>
144 class stMAMViewObjectSample{
145  public:
156  stMAMViewObjectSample(stSize size, stSize total){
157  // Calculate the acceptance an object.
158  P = ((double)size)/((double)total);
159  MaxSize = size;
160  Size = 0;
161  Objs = new ObjectType *[MaxSize];
162  }//end stMAMViewObjectSample
163 
167  ~stMAMViewObjectSample();
168 
178  bool MayAdd(){
179  if (Size < MaxSize){
180  return randomevent(P);
181  }else{
182  // I'm full.
183  return false;
184  }//end if
185  }//end AddThis
186 
193  void Add(ObjectType * obj){
194  if (Size < MaxSize){
195  Objs[Size] = obj;
196  Size++;
197  }//end if
198  }//end Add
199 
204  ObjectType ** GetObjects(){
205  return Objs;
206  }//end GetObjects
207 
211  stSize GetSize(){
212  return Size;
213  }//end GetSize
214 
218  stSize GetDesiredSampleSize(){
219  return MaxSize;
220  }//end GetDesiredSampleSize
221  private:
225  double P;
226 
230  stSize Size;
231 
235  stSize MaxSize;
236 
240  ObjectType ** Objs;
241 };//end class

254 template <class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
255 class stMAMViewExtractor{
256  public:
264  stMAMViewExtractor(EvaluatorType * eval){
265  Eval = eval;
266  Serial = 0;
267  Output = NULL;
268  Mapper = NULL;
269 
270  // First state.
271  StateStack.push(ST_DISABLE);
272  }//end EvaluatorType
